price: 13. Wuxuu kaloo idiin sakhirayna waxa ku sugan samooyinka iyo waxa ku sugan arlada, dhammaan waa Gallad iyo Naxariis Xaggiisa ah. Waxaa (arrin) kani ugu sugan calaamooyin ciddii fikiri.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مِّنۡهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakum mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan min'hu inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yatafakkarūna
